BackupDatabase.name: BackupDatabase
BackupDatabase.description: Grants permission to perform backup operation on a specified database

DeleteResourcePermission.name: DeleteResourcePermission
DeleteResourcePermission.description: Grants permission to delete the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

DeregisterApplication.name: DeregisterApplication
DeregisterApplication.description: Grants permission to deregister an SAP application with SSM for SAP

GetApplication.name: GetApplication
GetApplication.description: Grants permission to access information about an application registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID or application ARN

GetComponent.name: GetComponent
GetComponent.description: Grants permission to access information about a component registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID and component ID

GetDatabase.name: GetDatabase
GetDatabase.description: Grants permission to access information about a database registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID, component ID, and database ID

GetOperation.name: GetOperation
GetOperation.description: Grants permission to access information about an operation by providing its operation ID

GetResourcePermission.name: GetResourcePermission
GetResourcePermission.description: Grants permission to get the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

ListApplications.name: ListApplications
ListApplications.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all applications registered with SSM for SAP under the customer AWS account

ListComponents.name: ListComponents
ListComponents.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all components in the account of customer, or a specific application

ListDatabases.name: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all databases in the account of customer, or a specific application

ListOperationEvents.name: ListOperationEvents
ListOperationEvents.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all operation events in a specified operation

ListOperations.name: ListOperations
ListOperations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all operations in the account of customer, additional filters can be applied

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags on a specified resource ARN

PutResourcePermission.name: PutResourcePermission
PutResourcePermission.description: Grants permission to add the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

RegisterApplication.name: RegisterApplication
RegisterApplication.description: Grants permission to registers an SAP application with SSM for SAP

RestoreDatabase.name: RestoreDatabase
RestoreDatabase.description: Grants permission to restore a database from another database

StartApplication.name: StartApplication
StartApplication.description: Grants permission to start a registered SSM for SAP application

StartApplicationRefresh.name: StartApplicationRefresh
StartApplicationRefresh.description: Grants permission to start an on-demand discovery of a registered SSM for SAP application

StopApplication.name: StopApplication
StopApplication.description: Grants permission to stop a registered SSM for SAP application

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a specified resource ARN

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a specified resource ARN

UpdateApplicationSettings.name: UpdateApplicationSettings
UpdateApplicationSettings.description: Grants permission to update settings of a registered SSM for SAP application

UpdateHANABackupSettings.name: UpdateHANABackupSettings
UpdateHANABackupSettings.description: Grants permission to update the HANA backup settings of a specified database
